overview: Christopher Krook manages finance, human resources, legal, IT, and operations at InQuira. Prior to InQuira, Chris was the CFO of Comergent Technologies, Inc., a global leader of e-business software that was acquired by Sterling Commerce, an AT&T company. Chris has also held executive management positions with Connectify, Inc., NetGravity, Inc., and mFactory. His background includes positions at Arthur Andersen & Co. and he was a leader in two successful IPOâ€™s, secondary offerings, multiple acquisitions, and many private placements. Chris is a CPA and a graduate of the University of Colorado at Boulder.
